columns.description: The angular distance north or south from the equator of a point on the earth'ssurface, measured on the meridian of the point.
columns.name: latitude

columns.description: The angular distance measured on a great circle of reference from the intersection ofthe adopted zero meridian with this reference circle to the similar intersection of themeridian passing through the object.
columns.name: longitude

columns.description: Azimuth orientation in degrees (0Â° = due north) for home plate to center field.
columns.name: azimuth_angle

description: Static metadata for MLB ballparks: address, geography, capacity, surface/roof type, and foul-line/power-alley distances sourced from the StatsAPI venue feed.
name: Raw Ballpark Dimensions
